description:
Your day might be full of surprises, but that won't faze the Station Pant. This workwear-inspired men's pant is tough enough to handle whatever you throw its way, thanks to a heavier weight and rugged features.

It's not everyday you find a pant like this— that boasts both durability and sustainability— but the Station Pant delivers both thanks to its use of organic cotton. So it's true, you can have the best of both worlds!
name: Prana Station Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
